'''Green Feather Accessory''' is a Quest Item obtained during the {{Quest|Ann's Story}}. It reappears in the inventory after being used to obtain the [[Jabberwock's Holy Sword]] and [[Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz]].

Bringing the feather to the shipwreck of the [[Sponsian]] awards the {{Achievement|Fontaine Expects That Everyone Will Do Their Duty}}.

==Trivia==
* This item's icon appears to be an altered version of [[Wicked Mage's Plumule]].
